Reviews.Title: “Distinctly average”
Reviews.Author: SvenskTjej
Reviews.Content: rooms clean comfortable rather spectacular reception staff helpful flight rome early close piazza roma get bus airport capri perfect respect getting venice large suitcases pleasant best way get venice foot river bus station within walk lots local choose far enough away tourist

Reviews.Title: “NH VILLA CARPEGNA”
Reviews.Author: edmondoangelaccio
Reviews.Content: two teenage sons stayed one night august impressed friendliness staff lovely clean bedroom super bathroom bath shower excellent position venice near train station piazza roma walking distance st marks square breakfast adequate

Reviews.Title: “Too far away from the centre, rooms and towels were smelly”
Reviews.Author: Nausika_82
Reviews.Content: hotel carlton capri convenient spot short walk main areas venice hotel comfortable clean would recommend anyone slight negative staff exactly helpful night guy particular totally smiling dont mind get map enjoy

Reviews.Title: “Good and not so far from Vatican”
Reviews.Author: sranda
Reviews.Content: horrible experience travel europe every summer stay lot hotels worst experience yet 2 rooms carlton capri daughters stayed one seen bug 2 stay last night 10pm room hundreds bugs walls windows bathroom floor luggage absolutely went complain front desk came room bug spray explained daughters could sleep room said could give another full checked room 4 us slept queen size bed one tiny rooms 6am flight next morning top carlton capri would us night room filled bugs charged us room save avoid hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel To Stay At”
Reviews.Author: Peter H
Reviews.Content: location cant better close roma rialto piazza san marco steps due location side street behind canal quiet environment prices average venice expensive city get value money rooms rather small clean personal friendly

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel but far from sites”
Reviews.Author: pirkkotroy
Reviews.Content: partner booked birthday present 40th paid lot unfortunately contrary pictures posted website room ridiculously small reason unbelievable hot day night even though first day quite cold second asked another room told true reviews already posted show many large comfortable cupboard shower middle soaked everything tried use door closed use window towel rail sleep window wide open get kind air night course resulted us covered bites 2 days accommodation including early morning outside window banging drilling person reception said didnt start true seems pick choose give good rooms therefore would recommend hotel anyone wanting decent place sleep rest sightseeing venice unless prepared take pot luck accommodation supposed romantic special birthday treat turned great left us home today

Reviews.Title: “A GREAT HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: LankyB
Reviews.Content: review hotel visit venice last capri situated right behind larger sister hotel carlton grand canal hotel 10 minute walk main train station venice across bridge one positive points hotel hard find side street behind carlton grand canal hotel venice city hard navigate around everything looks like everything else getting lost venice norm hotel clean staff extremely polite room huge european standards large bathroom elevator small breakfast pretty good although found fruits think hotel well worth price pay piazza san marco long long walk away hotel however even map got lost trying find major attractions venice rides major attraction venice however would pay 100 euros 20 minute ride

Reviews.Title: “Not near anything !”
Reviews.Author: HedyS
Reviews.Content: around hotel undergoing extensive work sewage lines smell horrendous noise unbearable queen bed consisted two beds pushed together television turn mini fridge broken one assume juices mini bar spoiled breakfast quite good filling security seems front desk clerk give wrong key wrong guest two occasions never asked staff requested room keys time returned hotel

Reviews.Title: “Avoid”
Reviews.Author: xxx279
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 day business meeting also held hotel hotel clean room well food alright staff ok hotel located close vatican possible walk city center rome good 45 60 minutes meeting rooms used fine nothing fancy amenities would expect including wifi seem power issues several times days power would go come back within minute sleeping room fine clean bathroom wifi worked well safe room well ironing facilities possible turn conditioning appreciated room key needed twice course stay although im sure breakfast pretty good selection hot cold options stay fine would say average nothing particularly good bad hotel looking simple hotel surprises hotel

Reviews.Title: “good and bad hotel”
Reviews.Author: mazedaze
Reviews.Content: good hotel best nh rome closed anything need taxi go everywhere walking much confortable go airport hotel however good maybe fresh new structure good complex say excellent breakfast good rooms hot noisy say ok hotel good

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel & Value”
Reviews.Author: mikemurray2009
Reviews.Content: hotel located far away city centre walk 2 busses especially evening fewer busses metro available much us rooms small view walls smell cigarettes still around towels bathroom awful smell breakfast poor early still pool available hotel didnt live 4 hotel nh standards

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: lorri84
Reviews.Content: hotel located quiet green area 2 vatican city please aware located hill take taxi walking quite tiring outdoor swimming pool closed october room average size ok cant complain cleanliness breakfast quite limited choice hot meals good choice pastries sweets sum good hotel reasonable price

Reviews.Title: “Room was satisfactory”
Reviews.Author: dorothy_leong0
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights pre cruise hotel sunday flight asked could check accomodate us could get little sleep three couples coming us arrived front desk couldnt room 3rd floor away foot traffic room small adequate 2 furniture carpeting lobby furniture bit good one dinner 1015 euro cab ride stay recommend center day sightseeing

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY IN THIS HOTEL!!!!It's dirty,the staff are rude & arrogant & it's over priced..”
Reviews.Author: WDonnelly
Reviews.Content: agree thoroughly enjoyed hotel precruise stay welcome quiet day sightseeing crowds noises big city found personnel friendly helpful rooms clean spacious breakfast bacon enough options fill one take sights walk vatican first day 7 euros way hill lol airport pickup hotel almost 16 hours airports planes security best 65 euros ever spent lots precruise guests happy hour group met bar evening share would certainly stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Overall value and a warm welcome made up for location”
Reviews.Author: Marie890
Reviews.Content: get negative reviews great huge american style hotel please us rooms big clean outdated breakfast included located beaten path quiet place thats 10 euro cab ride vatican dont stay noisy filled area mcdonalds within walking distance ignore negative reviews plus reasonably priced place stay rome

Reviews.Title: “pricy, wouldnt stay again.”
Reviews.Author: 12121212Wm
Reviews.Content: recent trip rome stayed hotel 2 nights disappointed location terrible nothing close within walking distance vatican city hike lobby impressive thats carpet halls room buffet breakfast left much desired group kept running food coffee coffee cups ate dinner one night hotel expensive want location money would recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nothing great or special”
Reviews.Author: kennydoll
Reviews.Content: service would recommend hotel staff restaurant expensive pool one main reasons choosing hotel open despite brilliant weather september

Reviews.Title: “OK Hotel, but bad location for sight seeing.”
Reviews.Author: Badger_10177
Reviews.Content: stayed september 2011 hotel expensive extras expensive eg internet even lobby costs stuff friendly far away public transport although terribly hot pool closed bar often without service rooms ok breakfast usual recommend enjoy rome somewhere else

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel lead to a great holiday”
Reviews.Author: callumbann
Reviews.Content: cant say standards norm stayed many hotels around world im sure standards used people recommended hotel lobby updated rooms desperate need update front desk staff seemed put check us disappointment got rooms wouldnt bad staying heart rome 100 year old hotel outdated worn couldnt wait jump pool told wear cool 17 18 year old sons trying figure use flew pool seemed kind made wear one 15 minute walk main street steep cant see anyone issues taking shuttle downtown rome airport shuttle booked two nights disappointed asked cancel second night even told front desk could cancel reservation credit card would charged room three weeks still trying get money back would recommend crowne plaza st peters hotel courteous staff airport city center shuttle updated rooms great breakfast great pool better value little farther away city center well worth

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel To Stay At”
Reviews.Author: lloydmare
Reviews.Content: time arrived staff rude felt like always asking question rooms dated desperate need updating food fine lot selection pool nice except wear cap people seemed one shuttle service downtown shuttle service airport 15 minute walk bus system really little longer one must navigate large hill return trip hotel pay internet wifi worked lobby overall recommended wouldnt return better sheraton beautiful rooms little closer airport

Reviews.Title: “Hotel to far from center unless you really like to walk.”
Reviews.Author: ceet69
Reviews.Content: concerned staying center city nice affordable hotel area ok mostly residential apartments stores restaurants main street bottom hill rome bus system available bottom hill main street provides great access sites rome vatican 1 mile east quickly reached bus twenty minute walk included breakfast wonderful desk helpful

Reviews.Title: “Stayed for 4 nights”
Reviews.Author: GoldfinchDublin
Reviews.Content: checkin fast friendly requested quiet room also got room average terms space condition negative internet offered fee breakfast good met requirements location hotel far away downtown residential area purpose visit see downtown would choose another hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very good choice”
Reviews.Author: cult1
Reviews.Content: travelled rome may long girls weekend hotel wasnt usual nh boutique city hotel rather typical 4 chain little touches local map english overall service standard good throughout opted taxi vs city approx euros vatican 6 euro 15 min walk get metro buses negative points mention one meal bottle prosecco little lively waitress onto floor upon opening werent impressed tried hand asked another bottle offered us menu choice dinner adequate tasty opted pasta salad stay menu gave us sea baby also hotel often used city base coach tour guests irritating located room close lifts pickup 7am breakfast buffet excellent choices varied available set us long day sightseeing shopping

Reviews.Title: “NH Villa Carpegna - Nice Hotel!”

Reviews.Content: booked secret hotel location thing online special deal hotel clean nice room air con weak slept windows open heavy traffic wake early morning pool open summer months also minibar available room expensive coke juice menu room prices definately review using anything cup tea prices place went stay far expensive eat drink round 2 2 jack walk vatican took 30 mins didnt mind first day found difficult going back forth days taxi vatican costs taxi airport cost 4 people taxi cost cost 4 people 5 nights breakfast

Reviews.Content: reading reviews felt happy going hotel considering price paid via different website rooms asked double given twin asked moved new room cigarette smoke asked different room given double room used single couldnt move round sides bed dusty carpet needed good could pick stuff carpet going back reception told could move us tomorrow opted twin room cleanest following morning spoke reception moving us waiting move us short time rome decided would room little decided stay hotel used lot tour companies cruise lines always busy noise outside room often began 6am people began check luggage collected tours beds okay pillows hard rubbish asked extra ones better leaving sleeping without one comfortable house keeping okay didnt change sheets carpet entire time okay see carpet floor needs quick kinda think done basically make bed towels dont expect anything else hotel also warm slept windows open ac act street noise heat living busy street home made simple choice us food little area dine supermarket close bus stop bits need breakfast hotel fine service bar night poor waited 15 minutes service one night going reception ask someone serve facilities gym tiny 3 attempts get due cleaning difficulties open pool closed knew location horrible location terms airport decided without taxi using took us 25 hours airport hotel take taxi terms getting around day bus stop 5 minute walk talk vatican pantheon 15 mins dont waste time going metro bus 31 every half hour metro stuck bus take good map one hotel gives stops colosseum considering nh hotel seriously lets chain okay nothing special nothing great nothing terrible certain could paid amount got better hotel

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful pool area – but a bit far out”
Reviews.Author: DenmarkLotte
Reviews.Content: hotel nice enough reasonable breakfast quiet comfortable rooms main problem distance city centre travel connections unless travel cab youre buses last bus midnight youre clock watching also far difficult return hotel get ready go evening morning stay internet pricey also

Reviews.Title: “A very nice hotel but too far out”
Reviews.Author: puddyhustonEngland
Reviews.Content: great hotel decent location mile vatican hotel clean rooms great little fridge great beds clean date bathroom power shower safe tv english speaking channels pool great clean problem wasnt many chairs god sent hot weather arranged hotel pick us airport take us straight didnt want getting train termini station didnt want taxis waiting rip tourists cost 65 euros worth hassle free trip hotel location hotel pretty good 2 good supermarkets near limited number restaurants near hotel hotel restaurant expensive didnt great menu best way see rome get one city sightseeing tour buses nearest pick point vatican first days walked mile vatican back 3 days couldnt anymore tiring especially long day walking around rome last days got hotel ring taxi take us vatican taxi came less 5 mins cost 12 euros 4 people end day would get back done start holiday would best tip stay hotel good worth 4 star rating location wasnt big problem willing get taxi holiday great

Reviews.Title: “Great stay at Jolly Hotel Carpegna”
Reviews.Author: boltonlad
Reviews.Content: hotel great stayed three vacations rooms bigger youll find hotels europe breakfast plentiful morning every question asked staff pleasant helpful location isnt rome center easily catch bus get destination atm location convenient swimming pool nice cool sightseeing

Reviews.Title: “never go here”
Reviews.Author: ELREY123
Reviews.Content: hotel far vatican located seems upmarket area rome first impressions good reception pool areas smart checkin smooth efficient however room disappointment small little whilst furnishings old tired tea coffee making facilities one would expect price paid albeit room including linen bathroom clean breakfast hot cold buffet reasonable selection

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: lloydmare
Reviews.Content: position good city main attractions easily walk find shops get taxi walk metro reach saint peters less easy reach car large parking partly covered basement although hotel little hill fine views many rooms outdoor swimming pool hotel decor good although little dated room queen bed room average size everything needed looked old little tired stains carpet walls worn bathroom old tv small safe room limited minibar choice since hotel part nh family hope renovation take place service excellent reception restaurant food restaurant good enough breakfast food varied constantly replenished overall good comfortable experience hotel structure good position could easily become excellent choice rome renovations nonetheless still remains good choice regret live dated rooms remains much better many expensive hotels city

Reviews.Title: “Pretty good, but with some drawbacks....”
Reviews.Author: Sedona2222
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 7 days middle august husband 11 year old son good hotel opinion correctly rated 4 star rooms typically italian lots dark wood super king sized bed also additional bed son bit squeeze perfectly ok bathroom adequate fitted bidet shower bath etc finished hot water good water pressure breakfast good expecting breakfast disappointed pool absolute god send one reasons chose hotel large conference taking place hotel stay sun beds days hotel many people disappointed understand didn’t sun beds plenty room accommodate soon pool area deserted rest stay service around pool lacking say least order drinks went pool attendant waited whilst got store back pool took seated sort service expect paying 4 euros staff side left glasses case table breakfast returned 5 minutes realised done denied seen charged 10 euros price don’t realise non concerns member staff rude still ended pay 10 euros equivalent orange juice staff miserable bunch real shame hotel really position hotel quite good far concerned good 20 minute walk vatican heat august something wished husband unfortunately accident left rome made walking long problem decided hire car last minute car brilliant plenty parking hotel positioned top fairly big hill one would walking day sightseeing drove everywhere husband mobile phone maps europe drove main tourist sites problem parking meters everywhere car gave us drive coast 30 minutes away day beach drove 30 minutes went around famous gardens – really good afternoon day came home lunch 15 minutes ciampino airport hired car position hotel ideal without one please note august residents rome leave city don’t know whether would quite easy park rest year overall would recommend staying great week made good place base return rome future would probably stay without car

Reviews.Title: “The hotel is very good, but location is not”
Reviews.Author: MemberfromPadova
Reviews.Content: group italian three weeks cannot agree like home rooms spacious dinner rooms 7 people two supermarkets near dining easy affordable restaurant good quality times pricey since stay long supermarket route since large group 25 bound small issues room etc staff accommodating moved quickly wifi wasnt working room luggage easily quick trip florence read review welcomed back home wait staff sat eat yesterday smiled played staff become like family us pool lovely large refreshing gym small works conference rooms comfortable spacious location 15 minutes foot west vatican buses easy bus stop right left hotels entrance taxi run around euro night depending location hour course neighborhood foot hill great 2 supermarkets pizzeria point pizza beer local young romans afford come lucky whole experience

Reviews.Title: “Weekend traveller”
Reviews.Author: weekenderEssex
Reviews.Content: booked hotel website top secret hotel say worried read reviews happy say happily surprised whilst yes little way 20 min walk vatican great spacious hotel good standard breakfast excellent great selection staff friendly helpful want central hotel dont travel isnt however want somewhere away ideal would recommend hotel would stay

Reviews.Title: “Location wasn't great but decent hotel”
Reviews.Author: globetrotters21
Reviews.Content: hotel great – especially visit rome hot summer months hotel room average without much charm great breakfast buffet really makes different pool area absolute great spend week rome july enjoyed historical sight rome relaxing afternoons pool location bit far city centre don’t mind walking it’s 30 minutes walk centre also good connection bus visit rome days prefer hotel closer city situation great

Reviews.Title: “Far, Far Away!”
Reviews.Author: edmontontraveller11
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel daughter saturday september 17th nice far real get home nights get bus metro late going home get taxi ever go rome would want stay near centre could walk home places interest rome expensive taxi fares much provide computer internet 5 euros half hour keyboard told time chair low breakfasts lovely staff nice well spoke mind far lovely place stay

Reviews.Title: “overall a great choice”
Reviews.Author: zeczeczec
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel august 3 nights great stay rooms nice clean breakfast fantastic great selection including yogurt toast scrambled egg bacon sausage jams fruit pastries etc pool great relaxing long hot day although cold worth hotel bar restaurant might seem expensive first realise everything central rome ate hotel restaurant first night best meal rome location abit centre far taxi get bus ticket different matter

Reviews.Title: “A pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: KCRookie
Reviews.Content: made reservation 2 months advance upon arrival pm desk clerk told us due problems room available move another hotel clearly true since rooms due problems another couple told found highly could least two rooms answers course hotel less paying guests last one encounter major citys lying makes poor think stupid call advance would give guest go hotel picks guests probably pays hotel staff seemed interested daily appears

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, Good (not great) Location”
Reviews.Author: RFD
Reviews.Content: husband stayed jolly hotel carpegna six nights rooms large compared many hotels within central part rome breakfast plentiful morning front desk helpful whenever questions caught bus bus stop 4 blocks hotel far mcdonalds daily visit swimming pool nice cool sightseeing previously stayed hotel 2005 back size rooms many amenities hotel offered

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Option”
Reviews.Author: Dublinfemale
Reviews.Content: young family stayed jolly 5 nights mid summer strongly correctly advised pool aircon almost travelling kids italy time year found pretty good value basically get pool ac decent rooms good price however also get pain well centre town around west vatican nearest metro 15 minute walk hill residents stick nearby buses get town may may come quickly hot summer still take 1520 mins get anywhere interesting taxis quick arrive 10 12 euros way get expensive fast likes quiet rooms double glazed yet windows well aircon friendly staff throughout stay decent breakfast pain getting centre expensive restaurant much else close

Reviews.Title: “OK but a bit far out”
Reviews.Author: LondonMisses
Reviews.Content: hotel quite new well appointed clean rooms food good well problem location actually far city centre get st peters vatican single bus ride however hotel reached bus taxi bustling chaotic traffic rome make difference really short ride normally taking 1520 minutes may become nightmare 1 hour peak hours andor weather end good business hotel visiting rome sightseeing cars traffic better search different option car bus major attractions avoided

Reviews.Title: “Outside of town”
Reviews.Author: DiFred
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights good location away city centre travelling wasnt problem bought bus map hotel shop room comfortable short stay limited storage space adequate meal hotel breakfast provided good start day would happy stay

Reviews.Title: “LOCATION IDEAL-ROOMS VERY SMALL-STAFF STUFFY”
Reviews.Author: mike21212
Reviews.Content: husband went 2 week trip italy france via tours rome first stop hotel booked fine 2 night stay rooms clean 2 twin beds past trips europe beds hard come usually push 2 twins together mini bar fridge 2 towels face towels also rare may want request also tv italian except cnn suffer bring book also nice pool basic gym location lacking wasnt lot places eat near mcdonalds couple blocks road along super market hungry quick option would hotel restaurant wasnt open lunch bar salads offer said pretty pricey cheese sandwich 7 euros buffet breakfasts included package offered nice selection fruits cereals croissants rolls cheeses cold cuts etc us north americans also warm like bacon scrambled eggs usually runny tourist attractions werent close hotel 20 minute cab ride costing 15 euros trip take bus colosseum bad part tour group may want choose something closer dont means transportation

Reviews.Title: “Close to Vatican - Quiet”
Reviews.Author: toomacks
Reviews.Content: booked hotel reading reviews would recommend firstly far major sites rome even vatican fair distance especially 40 degrees c front desk staff talking amongst every time came would greet convenient conversation helpful bus routes really hotel far downtown bad smell hallway got elevator floor didnt seem matter went breakfast always wait table would open small section restaurant got table always felt rushed people line us

Reviews.Title: “September break”
Reviews.Author: Banditrider
Reviews.Content: stayed jolly villa carpegna july 2007 4 nights room standard minibar nice marble bathroom functional 12 length glass panel instead curtain tub beds firm like way hotel approximately 50 cab ride ciampino airport trip hotel driver took quick trip back airport went town took much longer free buffet breakfast great except runny scrambled eggs may done locally great selection good quality breads meats cheeses bacon scrambled eggs cereals juices yoghurt fruits sweet baked goods go hungry hotel located residential neighborhood small hill five minute walk main street find bunch shops needs including banks small supermarkets even mcdonalds neighborhood used atm bank rome get cash small street several great restaurants another supermarket usually ate least one meal daily sandwiches fruit snacks purchased ate room cheap best restaurants area ice cream point neighborhood barrestaurant great pizza also found great little family run restaurant next shop area back dining area nice menu well prepared meals highly recommended dinner much better anything found touristy areas also bus stop bit mcdonalds take past vatican go way colosseum took bus hotel local maps information every day found worked really well get sights travel old city busses stop early though seemed like matter rome cab back hotel would cost 8 12 euros bad tourist attractions seemed 6 10 block walk despite high heat july easy lots sightseeing foot tour bus people following guides around didnt seem much fun anyway saved expense hotel pool nice water felt cool even hot days good quality lounge chairs enough food drink service lots sun umbrellas great spending afternoons housekeeping staff thorough changed refilled everything needed towel change problem personally dont mid towel cons hotel couple miles sights thing walking distance vatican nearby areas front desk people werent especially knowledgeable friendly hotel wired internet available used computers cost 10 euros hour used would system 30 seconds message program every five minutes annoying prices also extra phone calls final bill get stuck paying maids personal calls hotel first time even dollar two bill checkout staff wouldnt phone calls though overall great stay jolly villa carpegna couple minor negatives

Reviews.Title: “Jolly holiday”
Reviews.Author: pinstrips
Reviews.Content: wife stayed villa carpegna three nights august post cruise package first time rome europe room size average american hotel good view pool two important features bathroom strong water pressure large towels carpegna though hot rome room great air conditioning breakfast included buffet style plenty choose taste scrambled eggs needed time runny many breads pastries helped overlook eggs dinner three nights hotels restaurant everything ate delicious though menus offerings rather expensive isnt europe though hotel located outside central rome quiet neighborhood twenty minute walk vatican couple blocks hotel catch bus st peters euro trip one romes best deals

Reviews.Title: “Good points and bad points”
Reviews.Author: 19katy80
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights tour mid march flight landed around 430 pm monday afternoon encountered airport wanted 60 euros take us hotel walked past got standard taxi ride took 30 minutes cost 35 euros including tip dont know hotel rated id say strong 3 star room small nice bathroom nice common areas nice breakfast buffet good staff good location far vatican really close anything located residential area theres mcdonalds close hill hotel along shops would definately stay

Reviews.Title: “Haven from the hustle and bustle”
Reviews.Author: rruparelia
Reviews.Content: arrived fiumicino airport 9pm took taxi hotel – advised standard taxi rate rome jolly villa carpegna hotel situated smart residential area 4 centre rome entrance impressive lobby staff helpful room spacious quiet overlooking green area breakfast smart dining area feast warned stops april use pool fine size suspect would welcome treat hot day sightseeing summer piano player every night bar many guests might due time year walk easily hotel vatican hill – 15 mins take bus centre rome back hotel taxi hotel offer limousine service hotel – avoid quoted us departure airport ciampino saying taxi would cost much taxi called us cost would recommend hotel oasis close wonderful busy noisy city rome

Reviews.Title: “Rome for my son's 18th birthday”
Reviews.Author: Jennyferk
Reviews.Content: stayed friend getting married rome hotel lovely pool really appreciated hot day sight seeing vatican within easy reach rest rome bit need rely public transport isnt easy work metro fine buses tricky metro nearby least 20 minute walk restaurants nearby hotel menu wasnt appealing used go sure locals go dinner great arent expensive hotel get taxi cost us 20 euros way worked pretty expensive week hotel clean smart often feel formal business like

Reviews.Title: “Great place”
Reviews.Author: Terrapin1
Reviews.Content: jolly hotel outside town vatican saved lot money taking public buses instead taxis quick walk hill main street catch bus breakfast enough big selection food even though eggs runny lobby spacious rooms clean well kept would ask nonsmoking area halls smokers smell one drawback area didnt many local restaurants choose taking bus go back closer town eat didnt try hotel restaurant

Reviews.Title: “If you need an affordable handy hotel with a pool, this is the place!”
Reviews.Author: barryuk
Reviews.Content: returned italy stayed 3 nights hotel location ideal since didnt want stay heart rome expected rooms small staff helpful

Reviews.Title: “great”
Reviews.Author: Nanamary
Reviews.Content: villa carpegna located quiet neighborhood 45 minute walk vatican tv radio bedroom sound bathroom tub shower bar dining area appear new well taken care clean quiet hotel breakfast buffet many plentiful small elevators hold 6 person maximum definite hotel rome

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable Hotel”
Reviews.Author: MikeCornwall
Reviews.Content: hotel ideal base sightseeing rome rooms comfortable breakfast good pool hotel added bonus 15 minute walk vatican get one frequent buses run main road hotel 3 day roma pass includes bus metro travel well queue colosseum worth cost staff came contact helpfull would happily recommend hotel overall much better value hotel city centre

Reviews.Title: “Could not fault it”
Reviews.Author: TessyP1
Reviews.Content: returned week hotel stayed 2 children aged 13 17 selection made bargain choice last one important factor choice hotel pool certainly lived expectations essential relaxation touring sites high temperatures august rome staff friendly helpful although suggestion walk st peters 15 minutes must strong following definitely 2 children street maps additional written directions specific bus routes provided request main attractions sites could reached within minutes bus metro rooms clean although ac bit noisy breakfast meal hotel pretty much traditional buffet buffet lunch terrace also available 14 euros although restaurant seemed apart breakfast doubt vast array options eating rome shops within 5minute walk hotel included supermarket excellent small pizzeria open hours day night amount pizza could purchased reasonable prices also mcdonalds close simply unable without minutes walk road towards city restaurant del appears nothing special staff friendly food certainly compared many restaurants city small tip also secured splendid 2007 12 pictures appearance try looking keeping straight face bus tickets must purchased boarding public transport could shop near hotel according sign door open rely times however staff seemed close open fairly basis whole really good bargain well worth stay

Reviews.Title: “A nice hotel a little too far from the action”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: family friendly clean comfortable four star hotel close vatican yet within walking distance pool awesome water cold end hotel provides towels everyone swimming also provided drinks bar expensive 11 euros pot tea 6 euros however bar staff friendly courteous also internet access ground floor costs 5 euros 30 minutes cards available reception stayed third floor notice sound air con units others commented used telephone twice make calls back uk expensive local calls seem cheap however rooms comfortable clean cool room private bar fridge put anything use charged 3 euros check 2pm hotel look luggage extra cost arrived little standard check time still able go enjoyed eat much like breakfast buffet hot food cereals fruit juices daily get center rome need walk 5 minutes catch bus plenty transport links main attractions one day bus passes cost four euro kids 10 travel free buy shops get bus need ticket keep safe watch pick pockets lost two mobile phones camera especially crowded buses trouble returning hotel buses stopped running taxis easy find caught taxi piazza hotel pay 15 euros know time oddly shaped green machines middle roads look like parking meters actual fact call taxis would return hotel loved time although must prepared walk take public transport drive get best attractions restaurants highly recommended especially dont mind walking paying taxis

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, Great Pool”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: booked hotel reading reviews trip advisor agree comments 1 hotel city centre way get hotel get line station get 31 bus get see service station approx 6 stops hotel located opposite side street warn quite steep climb hotel reception 2 get city centre quite easily getting bus also goes past vatican bus drop right outside preferred get 31 bus take metro also warned metro closes 9am learn bus routes 3 walk vatican takes 30 mins would advise either take bus metro stop outside hard find entrance ok hotel rooms small comfortable housekeeping service excellent asked double room got inside bed tiny told bed willing give us room 2 singles beds pushed together breakfast ok avoid fresh juices taste also dont really make obvious serve fresh ask try go early aswell went went 8am food finished dont apart complaints hotel lovely stay pool definately plus point gets really hot afternoons nice relax pool going rome would definately stay hotel reasonably priced looked much better hotels centre rome

Reviews.Title: “Not our favorite hotel in Rome - but a quick one night...”
Reviews.Author: ita5724
Reviews.Content: family returned 4 night stay jolly hotel villa 17 20 august previously mentioned rooms little small size barely problem bathroom fully equipped including press iron needed unless use service airconditioning hotel fantastic welcome relief heat rome distance sites hired car 4 days worked cheaper taxis etc airport comfort able get back hotel quickly night find problem parking rome italians certainly drive staff hotel ok problem wakeup call never came day leaving airport late pool staff polite pool exceptionally clean well looked swim towels provided hotel another welcome relief walking around boiling hot sites rome breakfast adequate buffet breakfast though bit sparse arrived late ate much us went eat evening eat drink hotel cannot make comment enjoyed stay would recommend hotel anyone visiting rome would definately stay 3rd floor hear air conditioning machines roof sounds like washing machines

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: jolly hotel villa carpegna great location many romes main attractions clean hotel modern amenities big disappointment however staff front desk overly helpful friendly asked directions assistance making sightseeing plans

Reviews.Title: “Ideal for rest and touring Rome”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: came back 8 nights hotel 20 minutes mostly safe walk vatican 30 mins main features dont worry walk within 3 mins hop bus trip 5 mins runs midnight super bus service really rooms perfect king size bed kids twin hotel giving us quiet rooms twin near spotlessly clean changed almost every night free electronic safe press pool simply perfect tho end far concerned tho limo service ciampino 55 euros less paid airport standard taxi comments price food drink meant didnt use restaurant bar snacks much might breakfast much 3 star quality even tho choice ok dont think price get better class city hotel pool

Reviews.Title: “Staff Unaccomodating”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: returned 4 days holiday rome hotel 25 min walk vatican take bus 31 subway station rooms small seen much worse said though rooms hotel general spotlessly clean reception staff spoke excellent english helpful included buffet breakfast good extensive choice filled croissants saw much worse 5 star hotel pool excellent spotlessly clean quiet lovely place relax particularly day sight seeing believe pool must mainly summer time visit rome find good restaurants five minutes walk hotel careful restaurant near hotel 18 euros 3 plate unfortunately italians sometimes lot would probably use hotel
